about.description:
Lock files record the exact state of an environment so that it can be
reproduced at a later date or shared with collaborators. conda-lockfiles
brings native lockfile support to conda with the ability to create and use
lockfiles across multiple formats and platforms. With multiplatform
support, you can solve environments once and deploy them consistently
across Linux, macOS, and Windows.
about.summary: conda-lockfiles adds support for additional lockfile formats to conda.

about.description:
Lock files record the exact state of an environment so that it can be
reproduced at a later date or shared with collaborators. conda-lockfiles
brings native lockfile support to conda with the ability to create and use
lockfiles across multiple formats and platforms. With multiplatform
support, you can solve environments once and deploy them consistently
across Linux, macOS, and Windows.
about.summary: conda-lockfiles adds support for additional lockfile formats to conda.

name: conda-lockfiles
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "conda-lockfiles" %}
{% set version = "0.1.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "95a7d2adf1b1a1b98ede9865bc6c7130a79089de751ceb15ff86af4ec182a888" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/conda-incubator/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - hatchling >=1.12.2
    - hatch-vcs >=0.2.0
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - conda >=25.9.0
    - ruamel.yaml

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - conda_lockfiles
    - conda_lockfiles.conda_lock.v1
    - conda_lockfiles.exceptions
    - conda_lockfiles.plugin
    - conda_lockfiles.rattler_lock.v6

about:
  home: https://github.com/conda-incubator/conda-lockfiles
  summary: conda-lockfiles adds support for additional lockfile formats to conda.
  description: |
    Lock files record the exact state of an environment so that it can be
    reproduced at a later date or shared with collaborators. conda-lockfiles
    brings native lockfile support to conda with the ability to create and use
    lockfiles across multiple formats and platforms. With multiplatform
    support, you can solve environments once and deploy them consistently
    across Linux, macOS, and Windows.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://conda-incubator.github.io/conda-lockfiles/
  dev_url: https://github.com/conda-incubator/conda-lockfiles

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jezdez
    - kenodegard
